t: DocuWare Unveils New Branding to Further Drive Global Growth
s: March 19, 2018 - DocuWare, provider of cloud solutions for document management and workflow automation, unveiled its new logo and corporate identity that realigns the company’s visual brand to its modern, cloud-first approach.

t: What industry is DocuWare in?
DocuWare - Wikipedia
s: January 30, 2024 - On October 27, 1988, DOCUNET GmbH was founded in Germering, Germany (near Munich) by President Jürgen Biffar. Since 1990, Biffar has been managing the company with his colleague, Thomas Schneck. DOCUNET AG has since been renamed and is now known as DocuWare.

t: DocuWare’s Acquisition by Ricoh Better Equips Us Both to Digitally Transform the Global Workplace
s: July 3, 2019 - Ricoh announced on July 2, 2019, that they had signed a definitive agreement to acquire DocuWare. DocuWare will operate as an independent subsidiary. So, our staff, brand, and product are here to stay.

t: DocuWare Transition to Amazon Web Services | Financial Services
s: DocuWare will be transitioned to Amazon Web Services starting at 2:00 p.m. on Friday, January 20, 2023, through Sunday, January 22, 2023.

t: How to change the DocuWare Web Client logo · DocuWare Support Portal
s: (For DocuWare Versions starting from 7.4) Copy the custom.css file and your logo file into this folder (Else, the DocuWare Logo is shown on the login page) C:\Program Files\DocuWare\Web\IdentityService\wwwroot\branding\
